name: planted.chicken
description: Our first marinated variant. Traditionally marinated with fresh herbs and lemon zest for a Mediterranean touch.
longDescription: The planted.chicken Lemon Herbs brings the taste of the Mediterranean to your plate. Pre-marinated with fresh herbs and zesty lemon, it's ready to elevate any meal. Simply heat and serve - the perfect shortcut to a delicious, flavorful dinner.
ingredients: Water, pea protein, rapeseed oil, lemon zest, herbs (parsley, thyme, rosemary), pea fiber, natural flavoring, salt, vitamin B12
preparation: Pan-fry for 3-4 minutes on each side. Serve with pasta, in salads, or alongside roasted vegetables.
